body_html: @aliabbasjp It looks like your dev data is very different from your training data. Maybe there are many unknown words given the vocabulary size you picked. Try running with dev data that is closer to your training data, e.g., split 10% off your current training data and use it as dev data.
body_text: @aliabbasjp It looks like your dev data is very different from your training data. Maybe there are many unknown words given the vocabulary size you picked. Try running with dev data that is closer to your training data, e.g., split 10% off your current training data and use it as dev data.
body: @aliabbasjp It looks like your dev data is very different from your training data. Maybe there are many unknown words given the vocabulary size you picked. Try running with dev data that is closer to your training data, e.g., split 10% off your current training data and use it as dev data.
